summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 RAM 1500. WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS AT A SHOP FOR AN OIL CHANGE, AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC NOTICED THAT THE BALL JOINT WAS FAULTY AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THERE WERE NO WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. THE DEALER WAS CONTACTED (FRANKLIN CHRYSLER/DODGE IN FARMINGTON, MAINE) AND INFORMED THE CONTACT TO BRING THE VEHICLE IN FOR DIAGNOSTIC TESTING. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE CONTACT ALSO STATED THAT HE DID NOT RECEIVE THE RECALL NOTIFICATION FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V302000 (AIR BAGS). THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 32,000. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
